## Core CDN Resources

The library provides pre-configured CDN headers for Tailwind CSS v4:

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-tailwind/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_tailwind/core/resources.py#L18"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### get_tailwind_headers

>  get_tailwind_headers ()

*Get the standard Tailwind CSS CDN headers.*

``` python
get_tailwind_headers()
```

    [script(('',),{'src': 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tailwindcss/browser@4'})]
